verses.name: Leviticus 25:16
verses.text: According to the multitude of years thou shalt increase the price thereof, and according to the fewness of years thou shalt diminish the price of it: for according to the number of the years of the fruits doth he sell unto thee.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:17
verses.text: Ye shall not therefore oppress one another; but thou shalt fear thy God: for I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:18
verses.text: Wherefore ye shall do my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them; and ye shall dwell in the land in safety.
